title: Scaling Night
description: Talks on scaling! - Auto-scaling PHP Applications using Chef and AWS    Andy Gale, Hello Future - Scaling at BaseKit    Ade Slade, BaseKit - Scaling wild LAMP for managed hosting    Clément Debiaune, Freelance BaseKit have kindly offered to sponsor the event again, and have offered their office as the venue, as well as beer and pizza! Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.
